title: Flanders Fallout: Marlen Reusser Undergoes Surgery for ‘Broken Jaw, Ear Canals, and 8 Teeth’
content:
Lizzie Deignan fractures arm in same crash, Matej Mohorič uncertain for Paris-Roubaix following Tour of Flanders injuries.

Read the full article at Flanders Fallout: Marlen Reusser Undergoes Surgery for ‘Broken Jaw, Ear Canals, and 8 Teeth’ on Velo.
author: ahood
